issue.title: [C++][Dataset] End to End dataset integration test case
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6769](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6769). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. Create a DataSource from a known directory and a PartitionScheme. 
2. Create a Dataset from the previous DataSource. 
3. Request a ScannerBuilder from previous Dataset. 
4. Add filter expression to ScannerBuilder (and other options). 
5. Finalize into a Scan operation. 
6. Materialize into an arrow::Table.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6769?focusedCommentId=16957013) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5675
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5675>
